questions.question: What is the current total value of your assets? (Include items like your car, home, property, business, or any other valuable possessions you own outright.)
questions.label: Total Assets
questions.name: assets

questions.question: What is the total value of your investments? (Include retirement accounts like 401(k)s, IRAs, as well as any non-retirement investment accounts.)
questions.label: Total Investments
questions.name: investments

questions.question: How much do you have in savings? (Include all your savings accounts, emergency funds, or any cash reserves.)
questions.label: Total Savings
questions.name: savings

questions.question: What is your total debt amount? (Include all debts such as student loans, credit card balances, mortgages, car loans, personal loans, etc.)
questions.label: Total Debt
questions.name: debt

questions.question: What is your gross monthly income? (This is your total income before taxes and deductions are taken out.)
questions.label: Gross Monthly Income
questions.name: grossIncome

questions.question: What is your net monthly income? (This is the amount you take home after taxes and deductions.)
questions.label: Net Monthly Income
questions.name: netIncome

questions.question: Do you have any additional monthly income? (Include side jobs, freelance work, rental income, etc.)
questions.label: Additional Monthly Income
questions.name: additionalIncome

questions.question: How much do you pay monthly for rent or mortgage? (Include any property taxes or homeowners association fees if applicable.)
questions.label: Rent/Mortgage
questions.name: rentMortgage

questions.question: What is your average monthly cost for utilities? (Include expenses like gas, water, electricity, internet, cable, and any other regular utility bills.)
questions.label: Utilities
questions.name: utilities

questions.question: How much do you pay monthly for insurance? (Include medical, dental, vision, auto, home or renters insurance, life insurance, etc.)
questions.label: Insurance
questions.name: insurance

questions.question: What are your monthly transportation costs? (Include car payments, fuel, public transit passes, ride-sharing services, maintenance, and repairs.)
questions.label: Transportation
questions.name: transportation

questions.question: How much do you pay monthly towards debt payments? (Include minimum payments on credit cards, loans, and any other debt obligations.)
questions.label: Debt Payments
questions.name: debtPayments

questions.question: What is your average monthly expenditure on groceries? (Include all food and household items purchased at grocery stores.)
questions.label: Groceries
questions.name: groceries

questions.question: How much do you spend on clothing each month? (Include all purchases of clothing, shoes, and accessories.)
questions.label: Clothing
questions.name: clothing

questions.question: What is your monthly phone bill? (Include costs for mobile phone service and any additional charges.)
questions.label: Phone Bill
questions.name: phone

questions.question: How much do you spend monthly on subscriptions? (Include services like Netflix, Spotify, gym memberships, meal delivery services, Amazon Prime, etc.)
questions.label: Subscriptions
questions.name: subscriptions

questions.question: Do you have any other fixed monthly expenses? (Include any other regular payments not already listed, such as child care, pet care, or recurring donations.)
questions.label: Miscellaneous Fixed Costs (an additional 15% will be automatically added to account for forgotten expenses)
questions.name: miscellaneous

questions.question: How much do you contribute monthly to post-tax retirement savings? (Include contributions to Roth IRAs or other post-tax retirement accounts.)
questions.label: Post-Tax Retirement Savings
questions.name: retirementSavings

questions.question: How much do you invest in stocks each month? (Include amounts invested in individual stocks, ETFs, mutual funds outside of retirement accounts.)
questions.label: Stock Investments
questions.name: stockInvestments

questions.question: How much do you invest monthly in other investment vehicles? (Include real estate, bonds, cryptocurrencies, etc.)
questions.label: Other Investments
questions.name: otherInvestments

questions.question: How much are you saving monthly for vacations? (Include any funds set aside specifically for travel and leisure activities.)
questions.label: Vacations Savings
questions.name: vacations

questions.question: How much are you saving monthly for gifts? (Include funds set aside for birthdays, holidays, weddings, or any other gift-giving occasions.)
questions.label: Gifts Savings
questions.name: gifts

questions.question: How much are you saving monthly for a long-term emergency fund? (Include any amounts saved for unforeseen major expenses or financial security.)
questions.label: Emergency Fund Savings
questions.name: emergencyFund

questions.question: Are you saving for any other specific goals? (Include funds set aside for buying a home, education, starting a business, etc.)
questions.label: Other Savings Goals
questions.name: otherSavingsGoals
